conversations.content: List all my sessions and tell me which one I worked on most recently.

tool_call: memoryManager_listSessions
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731087000000_v8w9x0y1z", "workspaceId": "ws_1731087000000_a2b3c4d5e", "sessionDescription": "Listing all sessions", "sessionMemory": "User working on multiple projects across different time periods. Previous sessions show patterns of multi-day work on various tasks and goals.", "toolContext": "Listing available items to provide user with comprehensive view of options. This operation builds context for subsequent selection or action.", "primaryGoal": "Show session overview", "subgoal": "List sessions by recency"}, "limit": 20, "order": "desc"}
Try to create a file that already exists.

tool_call: contentManager_createContent
arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1762639950708_oqe27zk8e", "workspaceId": "ws_1762639950708_wf6yma4h9", "sessionDescription": "Creating file", "sessionMemory": "User has been working on document creation and content management. Prior notes and files provide context for current edits and additions.", "toolContext": "Creating new resource based on user specifications. This enables user to set up required structure for ongoing work.", "primaryGoal": "Generate new resource", "subgoal": "Create content according to specifications"}, "filePath": "Daily/2024-01-15.md", "content": "# New Daily Note"}

This operation builds context for subsequent selection or action.", "primaryGoal": "Load book project session", "subgoal": "List sessions to find book project"}, "limit": 20, "order": "desc"}

Create Bug Tracker workspace in /Development/Bugs for tracking and resolving software bugs. Current goal is setting up bug triage process. Workflows: bug reporting with reproduction steps and severity, then bug resolution with fix, test, and release.
